data.name: RPGScenery - Dungeon Scene
data.detailed_description:
As you squeeze yourself through the crevice, you see a wall raised by a human - or at least, an intelligent - race. The wall splits into a corridor, one part of which lies in ruins, and the other leads to a vast hall from where new passages open. There is centuries of silence and tranquility in the corridors, and a soft sound of water in the distance.

This DLC contains 1 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
